articles.content: Randy Bullock kicked a 44-yard field goal with four seconds remaining and the banged-up Tennessee Titans rallied from a 10-point half-time deficit to beat the San Francisco 49ers 20-17 Thursday night… [+3227 chars]

articles.title: James Anderson: Don't just blame bowlers for Ashes failings - we need more help from coaches - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: It is the players who are not performing well enough so we have to talk about that honestly, which we did after the defeat in Adelaide
articles.content: We are in a position now where we have to win three Test matches in a row which is incredibly difficult but we had a good chat in the dressing room in Adelaide and we are determined to turn it around… [+3194 chars]

articles.author: Sami Mokbel, Charlie Walker
articles.title: Premier League players and managers warn top-flight chiefs they are at risk of BURN OUT - Daily Mail
articles.description: Premier League players and managers met top-flight officials on two separate zoom calls on Thursday to discuss the ongoing Covid crisis that has wreaked havoc to the fixture schedule.
articles.content:
Premier League players and managers have told top-flight officials that footballers are being run into the ground.
Players and managers met top-flight officials on two separate Zoom calls on Thursda… [+8097 chars]

articles.title: Pele: Brazil legend released from hospital but will continue being treated for colon tumour - Sky Sports
articles.description: Brazil legend Pele has been released from hospital in Sao Paulo but will continue being treated for a colon tumour.
